name: Unusual
headline: Tailor your website for each visitor.
description: Unusual uses AI to tailor your website for each visitor. Companies use Unusual to boost conversion from their SEO content, ads, and email and LinkedIn campaigns.

founders.name: Will Jack, Founder
founders.description: Unusual personalizes your website for every visitor. Previously founded Remedy, a healthcare startup. MIT alum.

founders.name: Keller Maloney, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder @ Unusual. Previously growth @ Gatsby. 15,000 cold call club. All american water polo player @ Princeton.

raw_markdown='![unusual logo](https://unusual.ai/assets/logo-w-text.svg)
Book a demo
Contact
# Tailor your website for each impression
Unusual customizes your website based on the source of the traffic. Whether the impression is from ads, social media, SEO content, email or LinkedIn campaigns, Unusual improves conversion rates.
Book a demo
![Hero tablet variation 1](https://unusual.ai/assets/hero/hero-tablet-1.svg)
### See what Unusual can do for you
Experience the future of personalized marketing before anyone else
Book a call
##### Inbound
## Make your site adapt to where your visitors come from
Unusual automatically generates custom content for every ad, social post, email, blog post, and anywhere else your traffic comes from.
![Tablet landing page variation 1](https://unusual.ai/assets/channel/channel-large-1.svg)
##### Outbound
## A custom website for every lead
Unusual builds a custom version of your website for every recipient of your email or LinkedIn campaigns. Use the information in your CRM to build a page that is just right for prospect.
![Personalized LP large variation 1](https://unusual.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fpersonalized%2Fpersonalized-large-1.png&w=2048&q=75)
##### Custom
## Custom websites at your fingertips
Create a unique version of your website by just describing what you want. Get an instant link that you can post or send anywhere.
![Prompt LP large variation 1](https://unusual.ai/assets/prompt/prompt-large-1.svg)
##### Easy Setup
## Works with your existing stack
Get started in minutes. Unusual works with any website builder and integrates with your favorite marketing tools. No migration or rebuilding required.
![Webflow](https://unusual.ai/assets/integrations/webflow.svg)
![WordPress](https://unusual.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fintegrations%2Fwordpress.png&w=128&q=75)
![Wix](https://unusual.ai/assets/integrations/wix.svg)
![Squarespace](https://unusual.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fintegrations%2FSquarespace%2BIcon.png&w=128&q=75)
![Google](https://unusual.ai/assets/integrations/google.svg)
![HubSpot](https://unusual.ai/assets/integrations/hubspot.svg)
![LinkedIn](https://unusual.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fintegrations%2FLinkedIn%20Logo.png&w=128&q=75)
![Framer](https://unusual.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fintegrations%2Fframer.png&w=128&q=75)
##### New!
### Available via Unusual API
Create new versions of your website programmatically.
Get API Access

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Unusual (2024)**

Website: [unusual.ai](https://unusual.ai)  
Location: San Francisco, CA  
Y Combinator Batch: F24  
Team Size: 2 employees  
Group Partner: Dalton Caldwell  

**Mission**  
Unusual aims to “tailor your website for each visitor.” They leverage AI to customize web experiences based on the visitor’s traffic source, enhancing conversion rates from SEO, ads, emails, and social media campaigns.

**What They Do**  
At its core, Unusual automates the generation of tailored content for your website. Here’s a quick breakdown:

- **Inbound Personalization**: Automatically customizes web pages depending on where each visitor comes from—whether it’s an ad, social media post, or email.
  
- **Outbound Customization**: For leads generated through email or LinkedIn, Unusual automatically crafts specific pages based on CRM data, ensuring each prospect gets a tailored experience.
  
- **Instant Customization**: Users can create unique website versions by simply describing what they want, receiving instant links to share.

- **Easy Integration**: Unusual enhances existing websites without requiring complex migrations. It seamlessly works with popular platforms like WordPress, Wix, Squarespace, HubSpot, and Google.

- **API Access**: They also provide API capabilities, allowing users to programmatically create new website versions.

**Value Proposition**  
Unusual is designed to improve conversion rates by delivering dynamic, relevant content tailored to each user’s needs. Companies can expect to save time, automate landing page creation, and ultimately increase leads—all while gaining insights into what messaging resonates best with their audience.

**Tags**: Marketing, Web Development, AI, San Francisco Bay Area

In summary, Unusual is shaking up the website landscape by using AI to make web experiences more personal, effective, and easy for marketers to implement. If you’re keen to boost your conversion rates and customize your digital outreach, now’s the time to explore what Unusual can offer.
